channel.title: Smoke effect
channel.description: Yes its another car image but it was all i could think of at the time, i found some cool smoke brushes on the interent which you can get [URL=http://falln-stock.deviantart.com/art/Smoke-Brushes-Set-1-92730901]here[/URL] and [URL=http://www.pbrushes.com/photoshop-brushes/misc/smoke-brush-set/]here[/URL] and here is the image [IMG]http://www.pwnmypic.com/images/14825584410736509480.png[/img]

item.title: Smoke effect
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

It looks really good now. Try to do some touching up on the sparkles that are isolated (either change opacity, blur them or delete them altogether)

There are also those two dark parts in the smoke that look like they are interrupting the flow. Obviously your choice whether to remove them or not.

Looks great though.

Read full topic

item.title: Smoke effect
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

i’ve added some changes, ive tried to make it look like the back half of the car is actually turning into smoke the best i can, but at the moment im havin difficulties with CS4 my monitor is fucked and the colours are all wrong

EDIT: in windows picture viewer the above image appears as

its yellowy and a bit f00ked anyone know what might be causing this?

Read full topic

item.title: Smoke effect
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:6, topic:306217”]I needs to look like the back half of the car is turning into smoke, that would be awesome.[/quote]This is what I was trying to look for.

Stick on a new uncut render of the car and add the brushes, or copy the smoke layers if you haven’t merged them.

Read full topic

item.title: Smoke effect

item.description:

item.title: Smoke effect
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

i’ll do that now, im also going to change the background to plain black to see what it looks like[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2009, 07:50:16[/size][hr]this is as much as i can bring it out

i erased the bottom bit previously so that last bit wont ever come into view, originally i had more smoke swirling around there but i decided to remove it

item.title: Smoke effect

item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

It would look nicer (imo) if you kept the front left tire out of the smoke so that the whole thing is visible.

item.description:

I guess it’s alright for showing off smoke brushes, the piece itself isn’t anything amazing.
